message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1400000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value the product holds for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1350000.

I understand that you're looking to get closer to the value the product holds for you, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my target price. Can you consider $1300000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1320000.

I understand that you're making one more concession, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my target price. Can you consider $1290000?
